alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:06PM EDT until August 07 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GARRETT COUNTY IN WESTERN MARYLAND...NORTHWESTERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...NORTH CENTRAL ROCKINGHAM COUNTY IN WESTERN VIRGINIA...NORTHEASTERN PENDLETON AND GRANT COUNTIES IN EASTERN WEST VIRGINIA...SOUTH CENTRAL MORGAN COUNTY IN THE PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA...SOUTHERN MINERAL...HARDY AND HAMPSHIRE COUNTIES IN EASTERN WEST VIRGINIA... At 306 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Piedmont to Upper Tract, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Moorefield, Petersburg, Romney, Bayard, Rough Run, Wardensville, Elk Garden, Kitzmiller, Upper Tract, Mathias, Capon Bridge, Burlington, Gorman, Russelldale, Yellow Spring, Arthur, Brushy Run, New Creek, Lahmansville and Perry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for western Maryland...western and northwestern Virginia...and eastern and the Panhandle of West Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
